title: What are some of the best books to know about Indian philosophy as a beginner? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have found some good explanations in Tamil books: “India Thathuva Gnanam” is an excellent book to learn about Indian philosophy.Quite recently I found an excellent summarized view of all philosophies from “sankhya” to “vedanata” to “Siddhantha” in a Siddha Book called - “Siddha maruthuva moola thanthuvam” by Dr. Sivashanmugaraja M. D.

For beginners and who are from non-hindu background, try “A Primer on Hinduism”, by D.S.Sarma, published by Sri Ramakrishna Math, Chennai. It is a sort of dialogue between a father and his little daughter. Simple and authentic.
